services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Dermatological treatment and care services we offer

acne.title: Acne Treatment
acne.desc: In acne treatment, a customized approach is followed according to the patient's skin type and acne severity. Topical medications, antibiotics, chemical peels, and in some cases, laser applications may be preferred.

pigmentation.title: Pigmentation Treatment
pigmentation.desc: Laser, chemical peels, and medical treatments are applied to remove skin spots.

botox.title: Botox & Fillers
botox.desc: Botox and filler applications for facial rejuvenation and wrinkle reduction.

laser.title: Laser Hair Removal
laser.desc: Permanent hair removal solutions with modern laser technology.

skincare.title: Medical Skin Care
skincare.desc: Professional skin care and medical treatment services.

prp.title: PRP Treatment
prp.desc: Natural rejuvenation with platelets derived from your own blood.

about.title: About Us
about.description: We provide the highest quality dermatological treatment services with our expert staff.
about.mission_text: To enhance our patients' quality of life by providing personalized skincare and treatment services using the latest technology and scientific approaches. We work to understand each patient's unique needs and deliver reliable and effective solutions.
about.vision_text: To be a center that follows innovative approaches in dermatology, prioritizes patient satisfaction, and provides services at international standards. We aim to add value to both our patients and our profession through continuous development and education.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
faq.q1: What should I bring to my first appointment?
faq.a1: Please bring your ID, any previous test results or reports, and a list of medications you regularly use.
faq.a2: SGK and private health insurances are not accepted at the clinic. Payments can be made by cash or credit card.
faq.q3: How long does the treatment process take?
faq.a3: The duration of treatment varies depending on the method applied and the patient's needs. Noticeable results are usually seen within 2-6 weeks after the first session.

tips.3: Drink plenty of water and eat a balanced diet.
tips.4: Choose products suitable for your skin type.
tips.5: Consult a dermatologist for suspicious lesions.
